    int N, X;
    scanf("%d %d", &N, &X);
    int A[N];
    for (int i=0; i<N; i++) {
        scanf("%d", &A[i]);
    }

    // Compute S array
    int S[N];
    S[0] = A[0];
    for (int i=1; i<N; i++) {
        S[i] = S[i-1] + A[i];
    }

    // Compute first part's answer
    int ans = INT_MAX;
    for (int k=1; k<=N; k++) {
        int start = N - 2*k -1;
        int sum_val =0;
        for (int j=start; j>=0; j -=k) {
            sum_val += S[j];
        }
        int E = k * X + 2 * sum_val;
        if (E < ans) {
            ans = E;
        }
    }
    int first_result = ans + N * X + 5 * S[N-1];

    // Now compute second part
    int n = first_result;
    int l =1, r =n;
    while (l < r) {
        int mid = l + (r - l)/2;
        int idxcnt = mid*(mid+1)/2;
        if (idxcnt < n) {
            l = mid +1;
        } else {
            r = mid;
        }
    }
    l -=1;
    int idxcnt = l*(l+1)/2;
    int result = n - idxcnt;

    printf("%d\n", result);

    return 0;
}
